p3 k13 p3 k1tbl p1 round 46 work chart row 46 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p3 k13 p3 k1tbl p1 round 47 work chart row 47 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p3 k13 p3 k1tbl p1 round 48 work chart row 48 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p3 k13 p3 k1tbl p1 twisted rib edging repeat the following for a total of 6 rounds needle 1 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p3 k1tbl p1 7 times p2 k1tbl p1 repeat on needle 2 bind off loosely in pattern thumb move 12 sts from waste yarn onto needles dividing evenly onto needle 1 and needle 2 pick up 2 additional sts per needle at base of thumb to close the gap 16 sts pm to indicate the beginning of round and join yarn knit for 8 rounds work twisted rib k1tbl p1 for 3 rounds bind off loosely in pattern 2 left mitt twisted rib cuff cast on 48 sts using a stretchy cast on method and divide evenly onto needle 1 and needle 2 being careful not to twist prepare to join and work in the round place a unique stitch marker to indicate the beginning of the round k1tbl p1 for 10 rounds left wrist work row 1 - 24 of lace chart each chart row is worked twice once per needle 1
